snippet: Mark Mahaney was dismissed by Citigroup after regulators discovered that he had responded to a reporter’s e-mail inquiry about YouTube without getting permission from the bank.
abstract: Mark Mahaney was dismissed by Citigroup after regulators discovered that he had responded to a reporter’s e-mail inquiry about YouTube without getting permission from the bank.

headline.main: Citigroup's Former Internet Analyst Finds New Home at R.B.C.
